Package com.noctarius.lazylog.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Validate.ExceptionBuilder
    The ExceptionBuilder interface is used to delay creation of exception up to the point where a validation really failed and a message was created.
    Validate.MessageBuilder
    The MessageBuilder interface is used to delay creation of exception messages up to the point where a validation really failed.
    Validate.Validation
    The Validation interface is used to implement internal and external validations based on Java 8 lambdas.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Validate
    The Validate class supports convenience validations to be applied.
